titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Barrasso. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works for the 115th Congress.
